title: Flask of Fire
summaries: The Flask of Fire is a flask that will cause any melee weapons (and whips) to inflict the On Fire! debuff. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, this effect will not be lost when the player dies.
The Flask of Fire cannot be used in conjunction with other flasks, and using it will remove any existing flask effects.
This item currently does not apply the debuff in PvP scenarios. The debuff lasts for 3–6 seconds.

statistics.Tooltip: Melee and Whip attacks set enemies on fire
